titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1162) to establish a Deficit Reduction Trust Fund and provide for the downward adjustment of discretionary spending limits in appropriation bills.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-243, by Mr. Goss.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1162 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment, the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Rules. The committee amendment shall be considered as read. Points of order against the committee amendment for failure to comply with clause 7 of rule XVI shall be waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 87.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/12/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the open rule for the consideration of H.R. 1162 (Deficit Reduction Trust Fund and discretionary spending limits in appropriations bills).
